education.info: Advanced fullstack development in .NET and react.
Focus on C#, JavaScript, HTML & CSS.

info: I started as a warehouse worker where, in addition to my regular duties, I contributed suggestions and implementations for several company procedures.
A few examples includes optimizing the return process, order printing, and a more efficient shelf numbering system.
I later became responsible for writing SEO-friendly product descriptions and finding effective and relevant keywords for new products.
Competed at the highest level in Starcraft II, becoming Swedish champion three years in a row and representing some of the gaming worlds largest sponsors.

During my time as a Starcraft player, I regularly participated in international competitions and lived periodically in South Korea and the USA, which strengthened my communication skills and me a fluent english speaker.
